cnd8:2.3.pli: adiṭṭhajotanā pucchā, diṭṭhasaṃsandanā pucchā, vimaticchedanā pucchā.

cnd8:2.5.pli: Pakatiyā lakkhaṇaṃ aññātaṃ hoti adiṭṭhaṃ atulitaṃ atīritaṃ avibhūtaṃ avibhāvitaṃ.

cnd8:2.6.pli: Tassa ñāṇāya dassanāya tulanāya tīraṇāya vibhūtatthāya vibhāvanatthāya pañhaṃ pucchati—

cnd8:3.2.pli: Pakatiyā lakkhaṇaṃ ñātaṃ hoti diṭṭhaṃ tulitaṃ tīritaṃ vibhūtaṃ vibhāvitaṃ.

cnd8:3.3.pli: Aññehi paṇḍitehi saddhiṃ saṃsandanatthāya pañhaṃ pucchati—

cnd8:4.3.pli: “evaṃ nu kho, na nu kho, kiṃ nu kho, kathaṃ nu kho”ti?

cnd8:5.4.pli: Manussā buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pañhaṃ pucchanti, bhikkhū pucchanti, bhikkhuniyo pucchanti, upāsakā pucchanti, upāsikāyo pucchanti, rājāno pucchanti khattiyā pucchanti, brāhmaṇā pucchanti, vessā pucchanti, suddā pucchanti, gahaṭṭhā pucchanti, pabbajitā pucchanti—

cnd8:6.2.pli: Amanussā buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pañhaṃ pucchanti, nāgā pucchanti, supaṇṇā pucchanti, yakkhā pucchanti, asurā pucchanti, gandhabbā pucchanti, mahārājāno pucchanti, indā pucchanti, brahmā pucchanti, devā pucchanti—

cnd8:7.2.pli: Bhagavā rūpaṃ abhinimmināti manomayaṃ sabbaṅgapaccaṅgaṃ ahīnindriyaṃ.

cnd8:7.3.pli: So nimmito buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pañhaṃ pucchati.

cnd8:8.4.pli: diṭṭhadhammikatthapucchā, samparāyikatthapucchā, paramatthapucchā … aparāpi tisso pucchā—

cnd8:8.5.pli: anavajjatthapucchā, nikkilesatthapucchā, vodānatthapucchā … aparāpi tisso pucchā—

cnd8:8.6.pli: atītapucchā, anāgatapucchā, paccuppannapucchā … aparāpi tisso pucchā—

cnd8:8.7.pli: ajjhattapucchā, bahiddhāpucchā, ajjhattabahiddhāpucchā … aparāpi tisso pucchā—

cnd8:8.8.pli: kusalapucchā, akusalapucchā, abyākatapucchā … aparāpi tisso pucchā—

cnd8:8.9.pli: khandhapucchā, dhātupucchā āyatanapucchā … aparāpi tisso pucchā—

cnd8:8.10.pli: satipaṭṭhānapucchā, sammappadhānapucchā, iddhipādapucchā … aparāpi tisso pucchā—

cnd8:8.11.pli: indriyapucchā, balapucchā, bojjhaṅgapucchā … aparāpi tisso pucchā—

cnd8:9.1.pli: Pucchāmi tanti pucchāmi taṃ yācāmi taṃ ajjhesāmi taṃ pasādemi taṃ “kathayassu me”ti pucchāmi taṃ.

cnd8:9.4.pli: Brūhi metanti brūhi ācikkhāhi desehi paññapehi paṭṭhapehi vivarāhi vibhajāhi uttānīkarohi pakāsehīti—

cnd8:11.2.pli: Vedagūti taṃ maññāmi, bhāvitattoti taṃ maññāmi, evaṃ jānāmi, evaṃ ājānāmi evaṃ paṭijānāmi evaṃ paṭivijjhāmi.

cnd8:11.4.pli: Vedo vuccati catūsu maggesu ñāṇaṃ paññā paññindriyaṃ paññābalaṃ …pe…

cnd8:11.6.pli: Bhagavā tehi vedehi jātijarāmaraṇassa antagato antappatto koṭigato koṭippatto pariyantagato pariyantappatto vosānagato vosānappatto tāṇagato tāṇappatto leṇagato leṇappatto saraṇagato saraṇappatto abhayagato abhayappatto accutagato accutappatto amatagato amatappatto nibbānagato nibbānappatto.

cnd8:11.10.pli: sakkāyadiṭṭhi viditā hoti, vicikicchā viditā hoti, sīlabbataparāmāso vidito hoti, rāgo doso moho māno vidito hoti, viditāssa honti pāpakā akusalā dhammā saṅkilesikā ponobhavikā sadarā dukkhavipākā āyatiṃ jātijarāmaraṇiyā.

cnd8:14.2.pli: Bhagavā bhāvitakāyo bhāvitasīlo bhāvitacitto bhāvitapañño bhāvitasatipaṭṭhāno bhāvitasammappadhāno bhāvitaiddhipādo bhāvitaindriyo bhāvitabalo bhāvitabojjhaṅgo bhāvitamaggo, pahīnakileso paṭividdhākuppo sacchikatanirodho.

cnd8:14.3.pli: Dukkhaṃ tassa pariññātaṃ, samudayo pahīno, maggo bhāvito, nirodho sacchikato, abhiññeyyaṃ abhiññātaṃ, pariññeyyaṃ pariññātaṃ, pahātabbaṃ pahīnaṃ, bhāvetabbaṃ bhāvitaṃ, sacchikātabbaṃ sacchikataṃ, aparitto mahanto gambhīro appameyyo duppariyogāḷho bahuratano sāgarūpamo chaḷaṅgupekkhāya samannāgato hoti.

cnd8:15.1.pli: Cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā neva sumano hoti na dummano;

cnd8:15.3.pli: Sotena saddaṃ sutvā, ghānena gandhaṃ ghāyitvā, jivhāya rasaṃ sāyitvā, kāyena phoṭṭhabbaṃ phusitvā, manasā dhammaṃ viññāya neva sumano hoti na dummano;

cnd8:16.1.pli: Cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā manāpaṃ rūpaṃ nābhigijjhati nābhihaṃsati na rāgaṃ janeti.

cnd8:16.2.pli: Tassa ṭhitova kāyo hoti, ṭhitaṃ cittaṃ ajjhattaṃ susaṇṭhitaṃ suvimuttaṃ.

cnd8:16.3.pli: Cakkhunā kho paneva rūpaṃ disvā amanāpaṃ na maṅku hoti appatiṭṭhitacitto alīnamanaso abyāpannacetaso.

cnd8:16.4.pli: Tassa ṭhitova kāyo hoti ṭhitaṃ cittaṃ ajjhattaṃ susaṇṭhitaṃ suvimuttaṃ.

cnd8:16.6.pli: ghānena gandhaṃ ghāyitvā … jivhāya rasaṃ sāyitvā … kāyena phoṭṭhabbaṃ phusitvā … manasā dhammaṃ viññāya manāpaṃ nābhigijjhati nābhihaṃsati na rāgaṃ janeti.

cnd8:16.7.pli: Tassa ṭhitova kāyo hoti ṭhitaṃ cittaṃ ajjhattaṃ susaṇṭhitaṃ suvimuttaṃ.

cnd8:16.8.pli: Manasāyeva kho pana dhammaṃ viññāya amanāpaṃ na maṅku hoti.

cnd8:16.9.pli: Appatiṭṭhitacitto alīnamanaso abyāpannacetaso tassa ṭhitova kāyo hoti ṭhitaṃ cittaṃ ajjhattaṃ susaṇṭhitaṃ suvimuttaṃ.

cnd8:17.1.pli: Cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā manāpāmanāpesu rūpesu ṭhitova kāyo hoti ṭhitaṃ cittaṃ ajjhattaṃ susaṇṭhitaṃ suvimuttaṃ.

cnd8:17.3.pli: manasā dhammaṃ viññāya manāpāmanāpesu dhammesu ṭhitova kāyo hoti ṭhitaṃ cittaṃ ajjhattaṃ susaṇṭhitaṃ suvimuttaṃ.

cnd8:18.1.pli: Cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā rajanīye na rajjati, dussanīye na dussati, mohanīye na muyhati, kopanīye na kuppati, madanīye na majjati, kilesanīye na kilissati.

cnd8:18.3.pli: manasā dhammaṃ viññāya rajanīye na rajjati, dussanīye na dussati, mohanīye na muyhati, kopanīye na kuppati, madanīye na majjati, kilesanīye na kilissati.

cnd8:19.1.pli: Diṭṭhe diṭṭhamatto, sute sutamatto, mute mutamatto, viññāte viññātamatto.

cnd8:19.2.pli: Diṭṭhe na limpati, sute na limpati, mute na limpati, viññāte na limpati.

cnd8:19.3.pli: Diṭṭhe anūpayo anapāyo anissito appaṭibaddho vippamutto visaññutto vimariyādikatena cetasā viharati.

cnd8:19.5.pli: mute … viññāte anūpayo anapāyo anissito appaṭibaddho vippamutto visaññutto vimariyādikatena cetasā viharati.

cnd8:20.1.pli: Saṃvijjati bhagavato cakkhu, passati bhagavā cakkhunā rūpaṃ, chandarāgo bhagavato natthi, suvimuttacitto bhagavā.

cnd8:20.2.pli: Saṃvijjati bhagavato sotaṃ, suṇāti bhagavā sotena saddaṃ, chandarāgo bhagavato natthi, suvimuttacitto bhagavā.

cnd8:20.3.pli: Saṃvijjati bhagavato ghānaṃ, ghāyati bhagavā ghānena gandhaṃ, chandarāgo bhagavato natthi, suvimuttacitto bhagavā.

cnd8:20.4.pli: Saṃvijjati bhagavato jivhā, sāyati bhagavā jivhāya rasaṃ, chandarāgo bhagavato natthi, suvimuttacitto bhagavā.

cnd8:20.5.pli: Saṃvijjati bhagavato kāyo, phusati bhagavā kāyena phoṭṭhabbaṃ, chandarāgo bhagavato natthi, suvimuttacitto bhagavā.

cnd8:20.6.pli: Saṃvijjati bhagavato mano, vijānāti bhagavā manasā dhammaṃ, chandarāgo bhagavato natthi, suvimuttacitto bhagavā.

cnd8:21.1.pli: Cakkhu rūpārāmaṃ rūparataṃ rūpasammuditaṃ, taṃ bhagavato dantaṃ guttaṃ rakkhitaṃ saṃvutaṃ;

cnd8:21.4.pli: ghānaṃ gandhārāmaṃ gandharataṃ … jivhā rasārāmā rasaratā rasasammuditā, sā bhagavato dantā guttā rakkhitā saṃvutā;

cnd8:21.6.pli: Kāyo phoṭṭhabbārāmo phoṭṭhabbarato phoṭṭhabbasammudito … mano dhammārāmo dhammarato dhammasammudito, so bhagavato danto gutto rakkhito saṃvuto;

cnd8:27.1.pli: Evaṃ bhagavā bhāvitattoti maññāmi taṃ vedaguṃ bhāvitattaṃ.

cnd8:28.3.pli: “evaṃ nu kho, na nu kho, kiṃ nu kho, kathaṃ nu kho”ti—

cnd8:28.5.pli: Dukkhāti jātidukkhaṃ, jarādukkhaṃ, byādhidukkhaṃ, maraṇadukkhaṃ, sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsadukkhaṃ, nerayikaṃ dukkhaṃ, tiracchānayonikaṃ dukkhaṃ, pettivisayikaṃ dukkhaṃ, mānusikaṃ dukkhaṃ, gabbhokkantimūlakaṃ dukkhaṃ, gabbhaṭṭhitimūlakaṃ dukkhaṃ, gabbhavuṭṭhānamūlakaṃ dukkhaṃ, jātassūpanibandhakaṃ dukkhaṃ, jātassa parādheyyakaṃ dukkhaṃ, attūpakkamaṃ dukkhaṃ, parūpakkamaṃ dukkhaṃ, dukkhadukkhaṃ, saṅkhāradukkhaṃ, vipariṇāmadukkhaṃ, cakkhurogo sotarogo ghānarogo jivhārogo kāyarogo sīsarogo kaṇṇarogo mukharogo dantarogo kāso sāso pināso ḍāho jaro kucchirogo mucchā pakkhandikā sūlā visūcikā kuṭṭhaṃ gaṇḍo kilāso soso apamāro daddu kaṇḍu kacchu rakhasā vitacchikā lohitapittaṃ madhumeho aṃsā piḷakā bhagandalā pittasamuṭṭhānā ābādhā semhasamuṭṭhānā ābādhā vātasamuṭṭhānā ābādhā sannipātikā ābādhā utupariṇāmajā ābādhā visamaparihārajā ābādhā opakkamikā ābādhā kammavipākajā ābādhā sītaṃ uṇhaṃ jighacchā pipāsā uccāro passāvo ḍaṃsamakasavātātapasarīsapasamphassaṃ dukkhaṃ, mātumaraṇaṃ dukkhaṃ, pitumaraṇaṃ dukkhaṃ, bhātumaraṇaṃ dukkhaṃ, bhaginimaraṇaṃ dukkhaṃ, puttamaraṇaṃ dukkhaṃ, dhītumaraṇaṃ dukkhaṃ, ñātibyasanaṃ dukkhaṃ, rogabyasanaṃ dukkhaṃ, bhogabyasanaṃ dukkhaṃ, sīlabyasanaṃ dukkhaṃ, diṭṭhibyasanaṃ dukkhaṃ;

cnd8:28.6.pli: yesaṃ dhammānaṃ ādito samudāgamanaṃ paññāyati, atthaṅgamato nirodho paññāyati, kammasannissito vipāko, vipākasannissitaṃ kammaṃ, nāmasannissitaṃ rūpaṃ, rūpasannissitaṃ nāmaṃ, jātiyā anugataṃ, jarāya anusaṭaṃ, byādhinā abhibhūtaṃ, maraṇena abbhāhataṃ, dukkhe patiṭṭhitaṃ, atāṇaṃ aleṇaṃ asaraṇaṃ asaraṇībhūtaṃ—

cnd8:28.8.pli: Ime dukkhā kuto samudāgatā kuto jātā kuto sañjātā kuto nibbattā kuto abhinibbattā kuto pātubhūtā kiṃnidānā kiṃsamudayā kiṃjātikā kiṃpabhavāti, imesaṃ dukkhānaṃ mūlaṃ pucchati hetuṃ pucchati nidānaṃ pucchati sambhavaṃ pucchati pabhavaṃ pucchati samuṭṭhānaṃ pucchati āhāraṃ pucchati ārammaṇaṃ pucchati paccayaṃ pucchati samudayaṃ pucchati papucchati yācati ajjhesati pasādetīti—

cnd8:29.2.pli: Ye kecīti sabbena sabbaṃ sabbathā sabbaṃ asesaṃ nissesaṃ pariyādiyanavacanametaṃ—

cnd8:29.4.pli: Lokasminti apāyaloke manussaloke devaloke khandhaloke dhātuloke āyatanaloke.

cnd8:32.3.pli: Pabhavaṃ apucchasīti dukkhassa mūlaṃ pucchasi hetuṃ pucchasi nidānaṃ pucchasi sambhavaṃ pucchasi pabhavaṃ pucchasi samuṭṭhānaṃ pucchasi āhāraṃ pucchasi ārammaṇaṃ pucchasi paccayaṃ pucchasi samudayaṃ pucchasi yācasi ajjhesasi pasādesīti—

cnd8:33.2.pli: Tanti dukkhassa mūlaṃ pavakkhāmi hetuṃ pavakkhāmi nidānaṃ pavakkhāmi sambhavaṃ pavakkhāmi pabhavaṃ pavakkhāmi samuṭṭhānaṃ pavakkhāmi āhāraṃ pavakkhāmi ārammaṇaṃ pavakkhāmi paccayaṃ pavakkhāmi samudayaṃ pavakkhāmi ācikkhissāmi desessāmi paññapessāmi paṭṭhapessāmi vivarissāmi vibhajissāmi uttānīkarissāmi pakāsessāmīti—

cnd8:33.4.pli: Yathā pajānanti yathā pajānanto ājānanto vijānanto paṭivijānanto paṭivijjhanto.

cnd8:33.5.pli: Na itihītihaṃ na itikirāya na paramparāya na piṭakasampadāya na takkahetu na nayahetu na ākāraparivitakkena na diṭṭhinijjhānakkhantiyā sāmaṃ sayamabhiññātaṃ attapaccakkhadhammaṃ taṃ kathayissāmīti—

cnd8:34.3.pli: taṇhūpadhi, diṭṭhūpadhi, kilesūpadhi, kammūpadhi, duccaritūpadhi, āhārūpadhi, paṭighūpadhi, catasso upādinnadhātuyo upadhī, cha ajjhattikāni āyatanāni upadhī, cha viññāṇakāyā upadhī, sabbampi dukkhaṃ dukkhamanaṭṭhena upadhi.

cnd8:34.5.pli: Dukkhāti jātidukkhaṃ jarādukkhaṃ byādhidukkhaṃ maraṇadukkhaṃ sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsadukkhaṃ nerayikaṃ dukkhaṃ …pe…

cnd8:34.7.pli: Yesaṃ dhammānaṃ ādito samudāgamanaṃ paññāyati, atthaṅgamato nirodho paññāyati, kammasannissito vipāko, vipākasannissitaṃ kammaṃ, nāmasannissitaṃ rūpaṃ, rūpasannissitaṃ nāmaṃ, jātiyā anugataṃ, jarāya anusaṭaṃ, byādhinā abhibhūtaṃ, maraṇena abbhāhataṃ, dukkhe patiṭṭhitaṃ, atāṇaṃ aleṇaṃ asaraṇaṃ asaraṇībhūtaṃ—

cnd8:34.9.pli: Ime dukkhā upadhinidānā upadhihetukā upadhipaccayā upadhikāraṇā honti pabhavanti sambhavanti jāyanti sañjāyanti nibbattanti pātubhavantīti—

cnd8:35.2.pli: Ye kecīti sabbena sabbaṃ sabbathā sabbaṃ asesaṃ nissesaṃ pariyādiyanavacanametaṃ—

cnd8:35.4.pli: Lokasminti apāyaloke manussaloke devaloke khandhaloke dhātuloke āyatanaloke.

cnd8:38.2.pli: Yoti yo yādiso yathāyutto yathāvihito yathāpakāro yaṃṭhānappatto yaṃdhammasamannāgato khattiyo vā brāhmaṇo vā vesso vā suddo vā gahaṭṭho vā pabbajito vā devo vā manusso vā.

cnd8:38.4.pli: Upadhiṃ karotīti taṇhūpadhiṃ karoti, diṭṭhūpadhiṃ karoti, kilesūpadhiṃ karoti, kammūpadhiṃ karoti, duccaritūpadhiṃ karoti, āhārūpadhiṃ karoti, paṭighūpadhiṃ karoti, catasso upādinnadhātuyo upadhī karoti, cha ajjhattikāni āyatanāni upadhī karoti, cha viññāṇakāye upadhī karoti janeti sañjaneti nibbatteti abhinibbattetīti—

cnd8:39.1.pli: Punappunaṃ dukkhamupeti mandoti punappunaṃ jātidukkhaṃ jarādukkhaṃ byādhidukkhaṃ maraṇadukkhaṃ sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsadukkhaṃ eti samupeti upagacchati gaṇhāti parāmasati abhinivisatīti—

cnd8:39.3.pli: Mandoti mando momuho avidvā avijjāgato aññāṇī avibhāvī duppaññoti—

cnd8:40.2.pli: Tasmāti taṅkāraṇā taṃhetu tappaccayā taṃnidānā etaṃ ādīnavaṃ sampassamāno upadhīsūti tasmā.

cnd8:40.3.pli: Pajānanti pajānanto ājānanto vijānanto paṭivijānanto paṭivijjhanto, “sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā”ti pajānanto ājānanto vijānanto paṭivijānanto paṭivijjhanto,

cnd8:40.6.pli: “yaṃ kiñci samudayadhammaṃ sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhamman”ti pajānanto ājānanto vijānanto paṭivijānanto paṭivijjhanto.

cnd8:40.7.pli: Upadhiṃ na kayirāti taṇhūpadhiṃ na kareyya, diṭṭhūpadhiṃ na kareyya, kilesūpadhiṃ na kareyya, duccaritūpadhiṃ na kareyya, āhārūpadhiṃ na kareyya, paṭighūpadhiṃ na kareyya, catasso upādinnadhātuyo upadhī na kareyya, cha ajjhattikāni āyatanāni upadhī na kareyya, cha viññāṇakāye upadhī na kareyya, na janeyya na sañjaneyya na nibbatteyya nābhinibbatteyyāti—

cnd8:41.2.pli: Pabhavānupassīti dukkhassa mūlānupassī hetānupassī nidānānupassī sambhavānupassī pabhavānupassī samuṭṭhānānupassī āhārānupassī ārammaṇānupassī paccayānupassī samudayānupassī.

cnd8:41.4.pli: Yā paññā pajānanā …pe… amoho dhammavicayo sammādiṭṭhi.

cnd8:41.5.pli: Imāya anupassanāya paññāya upeto hoti samupeto upāgato samupāgato upapanno samupapanno samannāgato.

cnd8:44.1.pli: Yaṃ taṃ apucchimha akittayī noti yaṃ taṃ apucchimha ayācimha ajjhesimha pasādayimha.

cnd8:44.2.pli: Akittayī noti kittitaṃ pakittitaṃ ācikkhitaṃ desitaṃ paññapitaṃ paṭṭhapitaṃ vivaritaṃ vibhattaṃ uttānīkataṃ pakāsitanti—

cnd8:45.1.pli: Aññaṃ taṃ pucchāma tadiṅgha brūhīti aññaṃ taṃ pucchāma, aññaṃ taṃ yācāma, aññaṃ taṃ ajjhesāma, aññaṃ taṃ pasādema, uttari taṃ pucchāma.

cnd8:45.2.pli: Tadiṅgha brūhīti iṅgha brūhi ācikkhāhi desehi paññapehi paṭṭhapehi vivarāhi vibhajāhi uttānīkarohi pakāsehīti—

cnd8:46.1.pli: Kathaṃ nu dhīrā vitaranti oghaṃ, jātiṃ jaraṃ sokapariddavañcāti.

cnd8:46.3.pli: “evaṃ nu kho, nanu kho, kiṃ nu kho, kathaṃ nu kho”ti—

cnd8:46.5.pli: Dhīrāti dhīrā paṇḍitā paññavanto buddhimanto ñāṇino vibhāvino medhāvino.

cnd8:46.7.pli: Jātīti yā tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ tamhi tamhi sattanikāye jāti sañjāti okkanti nibbatti abhinibbatti khandhānaṃ pātubhāvo āyatanānaṃ paṭilābho.

cnd8:46.8.pli: Jarāti yā tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ tamhi tamhi sattanikāye jarā jīraṇatā khaṇḍiccaṃ pāliccaṃ valittacatā āyuno saṃhāni indriyānaṃ paripāko.

cnd8:46.9.pli: Sokoti ñātibyasanena vā phuṭṭhassa bhogabyasanena vā phuṭṭhassa rogabyasanena vā phuṭṭhassa sīlabyasanena vā phuṭṭhassa diṭṭhibyasanena vā phuṭṭhassa aññataraññatarena byasanena vā samannāgatassa aññataraññatarena dukkhadhammena vā phuṭṭhassa soko socanā socitattaṃ antosoko antoparisoko antoḍāho antopariḍāho cetaso parijjhāyanā domanassaṃ sokasallaṃ.

cnd8:46.10.pli: Paridevoti ñātibyasanena vā phuṭṭhassa bhogabyasanena vā phuṭṭhassa rogabyasanena vā phuṭṭhassa sīlabyasanena vā phuṭṭhassa diṭṭhibyasanena vā phuṭṭhassa aññataraññatarena byasanena vā samannāgatassa aññataraññatarena dukkhadhammena vā phuṭṭhassa ādevo paridevo ādevanā paridevanā ādevitattaṃ paridevitattaṃ vācā palāpo vippalāpo lālappo lālappanā lālappitattaṃ.

cnd8:47.1.pli: Kathaṃ nu dhīrā vitaranti oghaṃ, jātiṃ jaraṃ sokapariddavañcāti dhīrā kathaṃ oghañca jātiñca jarañca sokañca paridevañca taranti uttaranti pataranti samatikkamanti vītivattantīti—

cnd8:47.2.pli: kathaṃ nu dhīrā vitaranti oghaṃ, jātiṃ jaraṃ sokapariddavañca.

cnd8:48.2.pli: Tanti yaṃ pucchāmi yaṃ yācāmi yaṃ ajjhesāmi yaṃ pasādemi.

cnd8:48.4.pli: Yā paññā pajānanā …pe… amoho dhammavicayo sammādiṭṭhi.

cnd8:48.5.pli: Bhagavā tena ñāṇena samannāgato muni monappatto.

cnd8:54.3.pli: agāramunino, anagāramunino, sekhamunino, asekhamunino, paccekamunino munimuninoti.

cnd8:58.1.pli: Sādhu viyākarohīti taṃ sādhu ācikkhāhi desehi paññapehi paṭṭhapehi vivarāhi vibhajāhi uttānīkarohi pakāsehīti—

cnd8:58.3.pli: Tathā hi te vidito esa dhammoti tathā hi te vidito tulito tīrito vibhūto vibhāvito esa dhammoti—

cnd8:58.4.pli: tathā hi te vidito esa dhammo.

cnd8:59.6.pli: Tathā hi te vidito esa dhammo”ti.

cnd8:61.2.pli: Dhammanti ādikalyāṇaṃ majjhekalyāṇaṃ pariyosānakalyāṇaṃ sātthaṃ sabyañjanaṃ kevalaparipuṇṇaṃ parisuddhaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, cattāro satipaṭṭhāne, cattāro sammappadhāne, cattāro iddhipāde, pañcindriyāni, pañca balāni, satta bojjhaṅge, ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ, nibbānañca, nibbānagāminiñca paṭipadaṃ kittayissāmi ācikkhissāmi desessāmi paññapessāmi paṭṭhapessāmi vivarissāmi vibhajissāmi uttānīkarissāmi pakāsissāmīti—

cnd8:62.2.pli: Diṭṭhe dhammeti diṭṭhe dhamme ñāte dhamme tulite dhamme tīrite dhamme vibhūte dhamme vibhāvite dhamme sabbe saṅkhārā aniccāti …pe…

cnd8:62.3.pli: yaṃ kiñci samudayadhammaṃ sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhammanti diṭṭhe dhamme ñāte dhamme tulite dhamme tīrite dhamme vibhūte dhamme vibhāvite dhammeti—

cnd8:62.5.pli: Atha vā dukkhe diṭṭhe dukkhaṃ kathayissāmi, samudaye diṭṭhe samudayaṃ kathayissāmi, magge diṭṭhe maggaṃ kathayissāmi, nirodhe diṭṭhe nirodhaṃ kathayissāmīti—

cnd8:62.7.pli: Atha vā diṭṭhe dhamme sandiṭṭhikaṃ akālikaṃ ehipassikaṃ opaneyyikaṃ paccattaṃ veditabbaṃ viññūhīti—

cnd8:62.8.pli: evampi diṭṭhe dhamme kathayissāmīti diṭṭhe dhamme.

cnd8:62.9.pli: Anītihanti na itihītihaṃ na itikirāya na paramparāya na piṭakasampadāya na takkahetu na nayahetu na ākāraparivitakkena na diṭṭhinijjhānakkhantiyā, sāmaṃ sayamabhiññātaṃ attapaccakkhadhammaṃ, taṃ kathayissāmīti—

cnd8:63.1.pli: Yaṃ viditvā sato caranti yaṃ viditaṃ katvā tulayitvā tīrayitvā vibhāvayitvā vibhūtaṃ katvā, “sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā”ti viditaṃ katvā tulayitvā tīrayitvā vibhāvayitvā vibhūtaṃ katvā,

cnd8:63.3.pli: “yaṃ kiñci samudayadhammaṃ sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhamman”ti viditaṃ katvā tulayitvā tīrayitvā vibhāvayitvā vibhūtaṃ katvā.

cnd8:63.7.pli: Caranti caranto viharanto iriyanto vattento pālento yapento yāpentoti—

cnd8:64.2.pli: Yo rāgo sārāgo …pe… abhijjhā lobho akusalamūlaṃ.

cnd8:64.14.pli: visālā vā pana sā taṇhā rūpe sadde gandhe rase phoṭṭhabbe dhamme kule gaṇe āvāse lābhe yase pasaṃsāya sukhe cīvare piṇḍapāte senāsane gilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhāre kāmadhātuyā rūpadhātuyā arūpadhātuyā kāmabhave rūpabhave arūpabhave saññābhave asaññābhave nevasaññānāsaññābhave ekavokārabhave catuvokārabhave pañcavokārabhave atīte anāgate paccuppanne diṭṭhasutamutaviññātabbesu dhammesu visaṭā vitthatāti visattikā.

cnd8:64.15.pli: Loketi apāyaloke manussaloke devaloke khandhaloke dhātuloke āyatanaloke.

cnd8:64.16.pli: Tare loke visattikanti loke vesā visattikā, loke vetaṃ visattikaṃ sato tareyya uttareyya patareyya samatikkameyya vītivatteyyāti—

cnd8:67.2.pli: Tanti tuyhaṃ vacanaṃ byappathaṃ desanaṃ anusāsanaṃ anusiṭṭhaṃ.

cnd8:67.3.pli: Nandāmi abhinandāmi modāmi anumodāmi icchāmi sādiyāmi yācāmi patthayāmi pihayāmi abhijappāmīti—

cnd8:68.3.pli: mahantaṃ sīlakkhandhaṃ esī gavesī pariyesīti mahesi,

cnd8:68.7.pli: mahantaṃ vimuttiñāṇadassanakkhandhaṃ esī gavesī pariyesīti mahesi,

cnd8:68.8.pli: mahato tamokāyassa padālanaṃ esī gavesī pariyesīti mahesi,

cnd8:68.9.pli: mahato vipallāsassa pabhedanaṃ esī gavesī pariyesīti mahesi,

cnd8:68.10.pli: mahato taṇhāsallassa abbahanaṃ esī gavesī pariyesīti mahesi,

cnd8:68.11.pli: mahato diṭṭhisaṅghāṭassa viniveṭhanaṃ esī gavesī pariyesīti mahesi,

cnd8:68.12.pli: mahato mānadhajassa papātanaṃ esī gavesī pariyesīti mahesi,

cnd8:68.13.pli: mahato abhisaṅkhārassa vūpasamaṃ esī gavesī pariyesīti mahesi,

cnd8:68.14.pli: mahato oghassa nittharaṇaṃ esī gavesī pariyesīti mahesi,

cnd8:68.15.pli: mahato bhārassa nikkhepanaṃ esī gavesī pariyesīti mahesi,

cnd8:68.16.pli: mahato saṃsāravaṭṭassa upacchedaṃ esī gavesī pariyesīti mahesi,

cnd8:68.17.pli: mahato santāpassa nibbāpanaṃ esī gavesī pariyesīti mahesi,

cnd8:68.18.pli: mahato pariḷāhassa paṭippassaddhiṃ esī gavesī pariyesīti mahesi,

cnd8:68.19.pli: mahato dhammadhajassa ussāpanaṃ esī gavesī pariyesīti mahesi,

cnd8:68.27.pli: mahantaṃ paramatthaṃ amataṃ nibbānaṃ esī gavesī pariyesīti mahesi,

cnd8:68.34.pli: Yo so sabbasaṅkhārasamatho sabbūpadhipaṭinissaggo taṇhakkhayo virāgo nirodho nibbānaṃ.

cnd8:68.35.pli: Uttamanti aggaṃ seṭṭhaṃ viseṭṭhaṃ pāmokkhaṃ uttamaṃ pavaraṃ dhammanti—

cnd8:69.1.pli: Yaṃ viditvā sato caranti viditaṃ katvā tulayitvā tīrayitvā vibhāvayitvā vibhūtaṃ katvā, “sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā”ti viditaṃ katvā tulayitvā tīrayitvā vibhāvayitvā vibhūtaṃ katvā,

cnd8:69.4.pli: “yaṃ kiñci samudayadhammaṃ sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhamman”ti viditaṃ katvā tulayitvā tīrayitvā vibhāvayitvā vibhūtaṃ katvā.

cnd8:69.9.pli: dhammesu … dhammānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānaṃ bhāvento sato … so vuccati sato.

cnd8:69.10.pli: Caranti caranto viharanto iriyanto vattento pālento yapento yāpentoti—

cnd8:70.2.pli: Yo rāgo sārāgo …pe… abhijjhā lobho akusalamūlaṃ.

cnd8:70.5.pli: Tare loke visattikanti loke vesā visattikā, loke vetaṃ visattikaṃ sato tareyya uttareyya patareyya samatikkameyya vītivatteyyāti—

cnd8:73.1.pli: Yaṃ kiñci sampajānāsīti yaṃ kiñci pajānāsi ājānāsi vijānāsi paṭivijānāsi paṭivijjhasīti—

cnd8:75.1.pli: Etesu nandiñca nivesanañca, panujja viññāṇaṃ bhave na tiṭṭheti etesūti ācikkhitesu desitesu paññapitesu paṭṭhapitesu vivaritesu vibhajitesu uttānīkatesu pakāsitesu.

cnd8:75.3.pli: Yo rāgo sārāgo …pe… abhijjhā lobho akusalamūlaṃ.

cnd8:76.1.pli: Panujja viññāṇanti puññābhisaṅkhārasahagataṃ viññāṇaṃ, apuññābhisaṅkhārasahagataṃ viññāṇaṃ, āneñjābhisaṅkhārasahagataṃ viññāṇaṃ.

cnd8:76.2.pli: Etesu nandiñca nivesanañca abhisaṅkhārasahagatañca viññāṇaṃ nujja panujja nuda panuda jaha pajaha vinodehi byantīkarohi anabhāvaṃ gamehīti—

cnd8:77.8.pli: Paṭisandhikā rūpaṃ vedanā saññā saṅkhārā viññāṇaṃ—

cnd8:77.10.pli: Bhave na tiṭṭheti nandiñca nivesanañca abhisaṅkhārasahagataṃ viññāṇañca kammabhavañca paṭisandhikañca punabbhavaṃ pajahanto vinodento byantīkaronto anabhāvaṃ gamento kammabhave na tiṭṭheyya paṭisandhike punabbhave na tiṭṭheyya na santiṭṭheyyāti—

cnd8:80.2.pli: Evaṃvihārīti nandiñca nivesanañca abhisaṅkhārasahagataviññāṇañca kammabhavañca paṭisandhikañca punabbhavaṃ pajahanto vinodento byantīkaronto anabhāvaṃ gamentoti—

cnd8:80.7.pli: Appamattoti sakkaccakārī sātaccakārī aṭṭhitakārī anolīnavuttiko anikkhittacchando anikkhittadhuro appamatto kusalesu dhammesu—

cnd8:80.8.pli: “kathāhaṃ aparipūraṃ vā sīlakkhandhaṃ paripūreyyaṃ, paripūraṃ vā sīlakkhandhaṃ tattha tattha paññāya anuggaṇheyyan”ti yo tattha chando ca vāyāmo ca ussāho ca ussoḷhī ca appaṭivānī ca sati ca sampajaññañca ātappaṃ padhānaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ anuyogo appamatto appamādo kusalesu dhammesu.

cnd8:80.12.pli: vimuttiñāṇadassanakkhandhaṃ paripūreyyaṃ paripūraṃ vā vimuttiñāṇadassanakkhandhaṃ tattha tattha paññāya anuggaṇheyyan”ti yo tattha chando ca vāyāmo ca ussāho ca ussoḷhī ca appaṭivānī ca sati ca sampajaññañca ātappaṃ padhānaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ anuyogo appamatto appamādo kusalesu dhammesu.

cnd8:80.13.pli: “Kathāhaṃ apariññātaṃ vā dukkhaṃ parijāneyyaṃ, appahīne vā kilese pajaheyyaṃ, abhāvitaṃ vā maggaṃ bhāveyyaṃ, asacchikataṃ vā nirodhaṃ sacchikareyyan”ti yo tattha chando ca vāyāmo ca ussāho ca ussoḷhī ca appaṭivānī ca sati ca sampajaññañca ātappaṃ padhānaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ anuyogo appamatto appamādo kusalesu dhammesūti—

cnd8:81.2.pli: Bhikkhūti puthujjanakalyāṇako vā bhikkhu sekkho vā bhikkhu.

cnd8:81.3.pli: Caranti caranto viharanto iriyanto vattento pālento yapento yāpento.

cnd8:81.8.pli: taṇhāmamattaṃ pahāya diṭṭhimamattaṃ paṭinissajjitvā mamatte jahitvā cajitvā pajahitvā vinodetvā byantīkaritvā anabhāvaṃ gametvāti—

cnd8:82.1.pli: Jātiṃ jaraṃ sokapariddavañca, idheva vidvā pajaheyya dukkhanti.

cnd8:82.11.pli: Jātiṃ jaraṃ sokapariddavañca, idheva vidvā pajaheyya dukkhanti vijjāgato ñāṇī vibhāvī medhāvī idheva jātiñca jarañca sokapariddavañca dukkhañca pajaheyya vinodeyya byantīkareyya anabhāvaṃ gameyyāti—

cnd8:82.12.pli: jātiṃ jaraṃ sokapariddavañca, idheva vidvā pajaheyya dukkhaṃ.

cnd8:85.2.pli: Etanti tuyhaṃ vacanaṃ byappathaṃ desanaṃ anusāsanaṃ anusiṭṭhaṃ nandāmi abhinandāmi modāmi anumodāmi icchāmi sādiyāmi patthayāmi pihayāmi abhijappāmi.

cnd8:85.4.pli: Mahantaṃ sīlakkhandhaṃ esī gavesī pariyesīti mahesi …pe…

cnd8:86.2.pli: Sukittitanti sukittitaṃ suācikkhitaṃ sudesitaṃ supaññapitaṃ supaṭṭhapitaṃ suvivaritaṃ suvibhajitaṃ suuttānīkataṃ supakāsitanti—

cnd8:86.4.pli: Gotamanūpadhīkanti upadhī vuccanti kilesā ca khandhā ca abhisaṅkhārā ca.

cnd8:86.5.pli: Upadhippahānaṃ upadhivūpasamaṃ upadhipaṭinissaggaṃ upadhipaṭipassaddhaṃ amataṃ nibbānanti—

cnd8:87.2.pli: Addhāti ekaṃsavacanaṃ nissaṃsayavacanaṃ nikkaṅkhāvacanaṃ advejjhavacanaṃ adveḷhakavacanaṃ nirodhavacanaṃ apaṇṇakavacanaṃ avatthāpanavacanametaṃ—

cnd8:87.5.pli: Pahāsi dukkhanti jātidukkhaṃ jarādukkhaṃ byādhidukkhaṃ maraṇadukkhaṃ sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsadukkhaṃ pahāsi pajahi vinodesi byantīkarosi anabhāvaṃ gamesīti—

cnd8:88.1.pli: Tathā hi te vidito esa dhammoti tathā hi te vidito tulito tīrito vibhūto vibhāvito esa dhammoti—

cnd8:88.2.pli: tathā hi te vidito esa dhammo.

cnd8:89.4.pli: Tathā hi te vidito esa dhammo”ti.

cnd8:91.2.pli: Te cāpīti khattiyā ca brāhmaṇā ca vessā ca suddā ca gahaṭṭhā ca pabbajitā ca devā ca manussā ca.

cnd8:91.3.pli: Pajaheyyu dukkhanti jātidukkhaṃ jarādukkhaṃ byādhidukkhaṃ maraṇadukkhaṃ sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsadukkhaṃ pajaheyyuṃ vinodeyyuṃ byantīkareyyuṃ anabhāvaṃ gameyyunti—

cnd8:92.2.pli: Yeti khattiye ca brāhmaṇe ca vesse ca sudde ca gahaṭṭhe ca pabbajite ca deve ca manusse ca.

cnd8:92.4.pli: Munīti monaṃ vuccati ñāṇaṃ …pe… saṅgajālamaticca so muni.

cnd8:92.5.pli: Aṭṭhitaṃ ovadeyyāti aṭṭhitaṃ ovadeyya sakkaccaṃ ovadeyya abhiṇhaṃ ovadeyya punappunaṃ ovadeyya anusāseyyāti—

cnd8:93.3.pli: Namassāmīti kāyena vā namassāmi, vācāya vā namassāmi, cittena vā namassāmi, anvatthapaṭipattiyā vā namassāmi, dhammānudhammapaṭipattiyā vā namassāmi, sakkaromi garuṃ karomi mānemi pūjemi.

cnd8:93.4.pli: Sameccāti samecca abhisamecca samāgantvā abhisamāgantvā sammukhā taṃ namassāmi.

cnd8:93.5.pli: Nāgāti nāgo ca bhagavā āguṃ na karotīti—

cnd8:93.11.pli: Āgu vuccati pāpakā akusalā dhammā saṅkilesikā ponobhavikā sadarā dukkhavipākā āyatiṃ jātijarāmaraṇiyā.

cnd8:96.3.pli: Bhagavā na chandāgatiṃ gacchati, na dosāgatiṃ gacchati, na mohāgatiṃ gacchati, na bhayāgatiṃ gacchati, na rāgavasena gacchati, na dosavasena gacchati, na mohavasena gacchati, na mānavasena gacchati, na diṭṭhivasena gacchati, na uddhaccavasena gacchati, na vicikicchāvasena gacchati, na anusayavasena gacchati, na vaggehi dhammehi yāyati nīyati vuyhati saṃharīyati.

cnd8:97.3.pli: Sotāpattimaggena ye kilesā pahīnā te kilese na puneti na pacceti na paccāgacchati.

cnd8:97.6.pli: arahattamaggena ye kilesā pahīnā te kilese na puneti na pacceti na paccāgacchati.

cnd8:98.1.pli: Appeva maṃ bhagavā aṭṭhitaṃ ovadeyyāti appeva maṃ bhagavā aṭṭhitaṃ ovadeyya sakkaccaṃ ovadeyya abhiṇhaṃ ovadeyya punappunaṃ ovadeyya anusāseyyāti—

cnd8:101.3.pli: Sakkāyadiṭṭhi bāhitā hoti, vicikicchā bāhitā hoti, sīlabbataparāmāso bāhito hoti, rāgo bāhito hoti, doso bāhito hoti, moho bāhito hoti, māno bāhito hoti.

cnd8:101.4.pli: Bāhitāssa honti pāpakā akusalā dhammā saṅkilesikā ponobhavikā sadarā dukkhavipākā āyatiṃ jātijarāmaraṇiyā.

cnd8:104.2.pli: Akiñcananti rāgakiñcanaṃ dosakiñcanaṃ mohakiñcanaṃ mānakiñcanaṃ diṭṭhikiñcanaṃ kilesakiñcanaṃ duccaritakiñcanaṃ, yassete kiñcanā pahīnā samucchinnā vūpasantā paṭipassaddhā abhabbuppattikā ñāṇagginā daḍḍhā, so vuccati akiñcano.

cnd8:104.10.pli: Akiñcanaṃ kāmabhave asattanti akiñcanaṃ puggalaṃ kāmabhave ca asattaṃ alaggaṃ alaggitaṃ apalibuddhaṃ nikkhantaṃ nissaṭaṃ vippamuttaṃ visaññuttaṃ vimariyādikatena cetasā viharantanti—

cnd8:106.2.pli: Tiṇṇoti kāmoghaṃ tiṇṇo, bhavoghaṃ tiṇṇo, diṭṭhoghaṃ tiṇṇo, avijjoghaṃ tiṇṇo, saṃsārapathaṃ tiṇṇo uttiṇṇo nitthiṇṇo atikkanto samatikkanto vītivatto.

cnd8:106.3.pli: So vutthavāso ciṇṇacaraṇo gataddho gatadiso gatakoṭiko pālitabrahmacariyo uttamadiṭṭhippatto bhāvitamaggo, pahīnakileso paṭividdhākuppo sacchikatanirodho.

cnd8:106.4.pli: Dukkhaṃ tassa pariññātaṃ, samudayo pahīno, maggo bhāvito, nirodho sacchikato, abhiññeyyaṃ abhiññātaṃ, pariññeyyaṃ pariññātaṃ, pahātabbaṃ pahīnaṃ, bhāvetabbaṃ bhāvitaṃ, sacchikātabbaṃ sacchikataṃ.

cnd8:106.5.pli: So ukkhittapaligho saṅkiṇṇaparikkho abbuḷhesiko niraggaḷo ariyo pannaddhajo pannabhāro visaññutto pañcaṅgavippahīno chaḷaṅgasamannāgato ekārakkho caturāpasseno panuṇṇapaccekasacco samavayasaṭṭhesano anāvilasaṅkappo passaddhakāyasaṅkhāro suvimuttacitto suvimuttapañño kevalī vusitavā uttamapuriso paramapuriso paramapattippatto.

cnd8:106.6.pli: So neva ācināti na apacināti, apacinitvā ṭhito.

cnd8:106.7.pli: Neva pajahati na upādiyati, pajahitvā ṭhito.

cnd8:106.8.pli: Neva visineti na ussineti, visinetvā ṭhito.

cnd8:106.9.pli: Neva vidhūpeti na sandhūpeti, vidhūpetvā ṭhito.

cnd8:108.1.pli: Tiṇṇo ca pāranti pāraṃ vuccati amataṃ nibbānaṃ.

cnd8:108.2.pli: Yo so sabbasaṅkhārasamatho sabbūpadhipaṭinissaggo taṇhakkhayo virāgo nirodho nibbānaṃ.

cnd8:108.3.pli: So pāragato pārappatto antagato antappatto koṭigato koṭippatto pariyantagato pariyantappatto vosānagato vosānappatto tāṇagato tāṇappatto leṇagato leṇappatto saraṇagato saraṇappatto abhayagato abhayappatto accutagato accutappatto amatagato amatappatto nibbānagato nibbānappatto.

cnd8:108.4.pli: So vutthavāso ciṇṇacaraṇo …pe… jātimaraṇasaṃsāro, natthi tassa punabbhavoti—

cnd8:109.1.pli: Akhiloti rāgo khilo, doso khilo, moho khilo, kodho khilo, upanāho khilo …pe…

cnd8:109.3.pli: Yassete khilā pahīnā samucchinnā vūpasantā paṭipassaddhā abhabbuppattikā ñāṇagginā daḍḍhā so vuccati akhilo.

cnd8:109.4.pli: Akaṅkhoti dukkhe kaṅkhā, dukkhasamudaye kaṅkhā, dukkhanirodhe kaṅkhā, dukkhanirodhagāminiyā paṭipadāya kaṅkhā, pubbante kaṅkhā, aparante kaṅkhā, pubbantāparante kaṅkhā, idappaccayatāpaṭiccasamuppannesu dhammesu kaṅkhā, yā evarūpā kaṅkhā kaṅkhāyanā kaṅkhāyitattaṃ vimati vicikicchā dveḷhakaṃ dvedhāpatho saṃsayo anekaṃsaggāho āsappanā parisappanā apariyogāhanā chambhitattaṃ cittassa manovilekho.

cnd8:109.5.pli: Yassete kaṅkhā pahīnā samucchinnā vūpasantā paṭipassaddhā abhabbuppattikā ñāṇagginā daḍḍhā so vuccati akaṅkhoti—

cnd8:112.5.pli: Vedagūti vedo vuccati catūsu maggesu ñāṇaṃ paññā paññindriyaṃ paññābalaṃ dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo vīmaṃsā vipassanā sammādiṭṭhi.

cnd8:112.6.pli: Tehi vedehi jātijarāmaraṇassa antagato antappatto koṭigato koṭippatto pariyantagato pariyantappatto vosānagato vosānappatto tāṇagato tāṇappatto leṇagato leṇappatto saraṇagato saraṇappatto abhayagato abhayappatto accutagato accutappatto amatagato amatappatto nibbānagato nibbānappatto.

cnd8:112.7.pli: Vedānaṃ vā antagatoti vedagū, vedehi vā antagatoti vedagū, sattannaṃ vā dhammānaṃ viditattā vedagū.

cnd8:112.14.pli: Viditāssa honti pāpakā akusalā dhammā saṅkilesikā ponobhavikā sadarā dukkhavipākā āyatiṃ jātijarāmaraṇiyā.

cnd8:114.1.pli: Naroti satto naro mānavo poso puggalo jīvo jāgu jantu indagu manujo.

cnd8:114.4.pli: vidvā ca yo vedagū naro idha.

cnd8:115.2.pli: Bhavābhaveti bhavābhave kammabhave punabbhave kāmabhave, kammabhave kāmabhave punabbhave rūpabhave, kammabhave rūpabhave punabbhave arūpabhave, kammabhave arūpabhave punabbhave punappunabbhave, punappunagatiyā punappunaupapattiyā punappunapaṭisandhiyā punappunaattabhāvābhinibbattiyā.

cnd8:115.4.pli: rāgasaṅgo, dosasaṅgo, mohasaṅgo, mānasaṅgo, diṭṭhisaṅgo, kilesasaṅgo, duccaritasaṅgo.

cnd8:115.6.pli: Atha vā saṅge bandhe vibandhe ābandhe lagge laggite palibuddhe bandhane phoṭayitvā vā visajja.

cnd8:115.7.pli: Yathā yānaṃ vā vayhaṃ vā rathaṃ vā sakaṭaṃ vā sandamānikaṃ vā sajjaṃ visajjaṃ karonti vikopenti—

cnd8:115.8.pli: evameva te saṅge vosajjetvā vā visajja.

cnd8:115.9.pli: Atha vā saṅge bandhe vibandhe ābandhe lagge laggite palibuddhe bandhane phoṭayitvā vā visajjāti—

cnd8:116.1.pli: So vītataṇho anīgho nirāso, atāri so jātijaranti brūmīti.

cnd8:116.2.pli: Taṇhāti rūpataṇhā …pe… dhammataṇhā … yassesā taṇhā pahīnā samucchinnā vūpasantā paṭipassaddhā abhabbuppattikā ñāṇagginā daḍḍhā, so vuccati vītataṇho vigatataṇho cattataṇho vantataṇho muttataṇho pahīnataṇho paṭinissaṭṭhataṇho vītarāgo cattarāgo pahīnarāgo paṭinissaṭṭharāgo nicchāto nibbuto sītibhūto sukhappaṭisaṃvedī brahmabhūtena attanā viharatīti—

cnd8:116.4.pli: Anīghoti rāgo nīgho, doso nīgho, moho nīgho, kodho nīgho, upanāho nīgho …pe… sabbākusalābhisaṅkhārā nīghā.

cnd8:116.5.pli: Yassete nīghā pahīnā samucchinnā vūpasantā paṭipassaddhā abhabbuppattikā ñāṇagginā daḍḍhā, so vuccati anīgho.

cnd8:116.7.pli: Yo rāgo sārāgo …pe… abhijjhā lobho akusalamūlaṃ.

cnd8:116.8.pli: Yassesā āsā taṇhā pahīnā samucchinnā vūpasantā paṭipassaddhā abhabbuppattikā ñāṇagginā daḍḍhā, so vuccati nirāso.

cnd8:116.9.pli: Jātīti yā tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ …pe… āyatanānaṃ paṭilābho.

cnd8:116.10.pli: Jarāti yā tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ …pe… indriyānaṃ paripāko.

cnd8:116.12.pli: So vītataṇho anīgho nirāso, atāri so jātijaranti brūmīti yo so vītataṇho anīgho ca nirāso ca, so kho jātijarāmaraṇaṃ atari uttari patari samatikkami vītivattayīti brūmi ācikkhāmi desemi paññapemi paṭṭhapemi vivarāmi vibhajāmi uttānīkaromi pakāsemīti—

cnd8:116.13.pli: so vītataṇho anīgho nirāso, atāri so jātijaranti brūmi.
